name: The Last Bounty Hunter
description:
The Territory has been overrun, and you're the last hope to rid the town of the four vicious outlaws - Handsome Harry, Nasty Dan, El Loco and The Cactus Kid. You better be quick, cause they're looking to get you!

These crazy outlaws will lead you through the roughest areas of the Territory so be careful. Ther'll be danger 'round every corner and shootouts with some of the fastest hands in the west. So come on, use that gun!

Take in the bounty's today with an American Laser Games Arcade Classic!

Other exciting features for this release include:
- Updated Gameplay
- Includes All Original Play Modes
- Remastered Game Footage
- Test Your Reflexes In Showdowns
- Play with your friends in local multiplayer mode

1-4 players
140KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
Network Features
PlayStation®Move motion controller and PlayStation®Eye camera required.
PlayStation®Move navigation controller or Wireless Controller optional.
